resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
liyafan82 opened a new pull request #11029:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11029


   When adding a byte `0xff` to a UInt1Vector, the toString method produces `[-1]`. Since the vector contains unsinged integers, the correct result should be `[255]`.


--

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description: When adding a byte 0xff to a UInt1Vector, the {{toString}} method produces {{[-1]}}. Since the vector contains unsinged integers, the correct result should be {{[255]}}.
fields.summary: [Java] The toString representation is incorrect for unsigned integer vectors
